title: JS Toastmasters
details:
Details
-------

Welcome to JS Toastmasters, where the main purpose of this event is for devs of all levels to get comfortable with speaking!

[Code of Conduct](https://torontojs.com/p/code_of_conduct) applies.

**Schedule**

*   6:15 pm Opening comments
*   6:20pm Rundown of Event Format
*   Introduce Hosts + Speakers
*   Thought of the Day
*   Story Time from our "Humour Master"
*   WOD ( Word of the day ): What kind of word could we use to expand our vocabulary?
*   6:40pm Speaker: Let speakers discuss their topics.
*   7:00 pm Break Time
*   7:10 pm Table Topics
*   8pm Wrap up

**About**  
The purpose of this event is to get comfortable with speaking to small and larger groups.

Speakers will be confirmed beforehand. Speeches are supposed to be 10-20 min and don’t necessarily need to be technical. You can talk about yourself, your hobbies, a story, or how you got into coding, practice an upcoming presentation, attempt answering an interview question.  
If you have a presentation to give at work feel free to use this venue as a dry-run.  
Note: This isn’t a platform to pitch or sell your startup idea, but you could use it to test the waters on telling the story of your startup.

**Roles**  
Each event will have TorontoJS members filling the roles as a learning/social experience!

Host: This time we have the guidance of a seasoned Toastmaster organizer, Rachael Concessio!

Speakers: 1-2 speakers with quick talks that can be about anything at all (programming or not) as long as it complies with our Code of Conduct.

"Humour Master": provides uplifting, profound or funny opening story to situate the audience. Think of the role like a yoga teacher trying to ground people instead of a standup comedian.

Table Topic Master: Hosts the table topic event. Table topics is a fun activity that gives everyone a chance to participate by answering impromptu questions.

Evaluators: provides feedback on how to improve speech and speaking

**Guild Trial**  
We're also trialling a new platform for Events & Presentations - Guild!  
Please register for this event on Guild by following the link below, in order to assist us with the trial. Thank you!

[https://beta.guild.host/events/WyJldmVudHMiLCI2MjMxNDk4NS05MzNhLTQ3NzYtOTU1Mi1jZmUwY2FiMTFkN2UiXQ==](https://beta.guild.host/events/WyJldmVudHMiLCI2MjMxNDk4NS05MzNhLTQ3NzYtOTU1Mi1jZmUwY2FiMTFkN2UiXQ==)
